org.jhotdraw.figures
Class ImageFigure

java.lang.Object
  org.jhotdraw.standard.AbstractFigure
      org.jhotdraw.figures.AttributeFigure
          org.jhotdraw.figures.ImageFigure
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Figure, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.io.Serializable, Storable
public class ImageFigure
extends AttributeFigure
implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver

A Figure that shows an Image. Images shown by an image figure are shared by using the Iconkit.

Version:
<$CURRENT_VERSION$>
See Also:
Iconkit, Serialized Form

release

public void release()
Releases a figure's resources. Release is called when a figure is removed from a drawing. Informs the listeners that the figure is removed by calling figureRemoved.

Specified by:
